regen.absent_element: mechanism to handle inconsistencies or errors during automatic status updates of case records
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a mechanism to detect and resolve inconsistencies or errors that occur during automatic status updates of case records.

regen.absent_element: tracking of changes to case records over time
regen.new_specification: The system shall maintain a record of all changes made to case records, including the date, time, and description of each change.

regen.absent_element: mechanism to handle inconsistencies or errors during automatic status updates of case records
regen.new_specification: The system shall implement a mechanism to detect and handle inconsistencies or errors that occur during automatic status updates of case records, ensuring data integrity and accuracy.

label: Systems supporting OM should track the changes made to the status of case records as a result of changes in the case definition.
absence: action of tracking changes made to the status of cases records
